amendment.description: To provide funding to the Department of Transportation for interstate bridge infrastructure projects and to reduce the Federal deficit by decreasing the amounts available for foreign assistance and loan guarantee programs administered by the Department of Energy.

action.text: Amendment SA 382 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Paul.

vote.text: Amendment SA 382 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 26 - 72. Record Vote Number: 82.
